articles.title: Education and Research Experiences
articles.contents:
Skills
Bioinformatics Analysis and Insight generation: Extensive experience with Microarray, RNAseq, and Single-Cell RNAseq data analysis using Bioconductor and R.
Programming Languages: Proficient in R, Python, LaTeX, Markdown, SQL, and Bash; experienced with version control using Git.
Scientific Computing: Skilled in scientific computing on Linux OS.
Data Analysis and Visualization: Proficient in using RStudio, Jupyter, Shiny, Spotfire, and other tools for data analysis and visualization.
Web and API Development: Experienced in developing websites and APIs using tools like pagedown, blogdown, Shiny, and distill.
Documentation and Reproducibility: Proficient in creating reproducible research documents using Quarto, Markdown, and LaTeX.

articles.title: Samanwoy Mukhopadhyay (PhD)
articles.contents:
I am a seasoned Computational Biologist specializing in Biomedical Genomics. With extensive experience in RNAseq, Single-Cell RNAseq, and Microarray data analysis, I excel in analysis and interpretation to insight generation. I have provided technical and delivery expertise across various high-impact projects, successfully managing numerous projects in industry settings to generate actionable biological insights. I am now seeking industry roles to further drive innovation in Biomedical Genomics and bioinformatics. In my free time, I enjoy discussing Christopher Nolan films, football, and exploring causal inference.
